body.name: Relassy Portable Printers Wireless for Travel, Inkless Bluetooth Printer for iOS Android Tablet Phone Laptop PC, Compact Printer with A4 Thermal Roll Paper for Home Vehincles Office Business School
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 mins
features: 👜【Perfect Solution for on-the-go Printing】The compact portable printer is lightweight and easily fits in a backpack or briefcase. For added convenience, the inkless printer comes with a built-in 6000mm roll of A4 thermal paper, and the unlimited length feature automatically stops printing when the contents are finished, eliminating the need for frequent paper refills. Ideal for business travelers and busy retail employees

🖨️【High Definition Thermal Printing Technology】Our high-quality thermal printer has 300DPI resolution and 3 print density options, and can print at speeds up to 10 millimeters per second for fast, crisp, detail-accurate prints. The thermal paper is smudge, fade, and water-resistant, saving you time and effort. You can use this wireless printer when you are in the car, discussing business with clients, printing reports at hospitals, printing paper at university, or printing menu at home

📜【Epitome of Simplicity and Convenience】one-button cover opening allows for quick paper roll replacement, and automatic paper suction ensures hassle-free printing. With one-button to start the bluetooth printer, you can connect to the mobile printer by downloading the "Tiny Print" app on your Android or iOS phone or tablet and enabling Bluetooth. For Windows or Mac computers, simply download the driver and connect the no ink printer with the included Type-C cable for seamless printing

💡【Multifunctional App for Promoting Creativity】Our home printer comes with an app that supports text and image printing, offering various printing options, materials, and templates. You can print documents, essays, photos, and artwork(Thermal paper rolls only). This versatile small printer meets different needs, allowing you to bring your ideas to life with endless possibilities. Printing has never been easier and more enjoyable

🔋【Built-in 2500mAh Powerful Smart Battery】Our travel printer can print up to 363 sheets (4245 inches) on a full charge. When the battery is low, a blue indicator light flashes to remind you to recharge, ensuring uninterrupted printing wherever you go. The printer automatically shuts down after 30 minutes of inactivity, optimizing battery life and conserving energy. Plus, we offer detailed instructions, a reliable 1-year warranty and lifetime after-sales support, available for further assistance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Compact, easy to setup and use without ink and wires
reviews.reviewText: The delivery was quick and box was nicely packed to avoid any damage. I was little hesitant in getting this printer but the its use case was very tempting. To be able to use printer without wires and ink is an amazing feature of this gadget. The print quality is good as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, to connect, and to use!since i frequently forget to print stuff when i have a printer near by to work on, this works for me. keeping it in my computer bag so i always have it. so handy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Portable Inkless and Wireless Printer
reviews.reviewText: I am giving this portable printer to my ten-year-old daughter for her 11th Birthday in near future. The construction of the printer is notably durable. Its sturdy build instills confidence in its ability to withstand the rigors of travel and everyday use. Connecting and setting up the printer is a breeze. I like the user-friendly interface facilitates quick and hassle-free printing, making it accessible for users of all levels of technical expertise. I would highly recommend for the affordability combined with the printer's functionality makes it a compelling choice for those in need of a portable printing solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works ok. It was easy to set up . It works decent for what it is but the print quality for a thermal printer leaves am little to be desired does get details very well. I have used better thermal printer this one could use some improvements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The app you use to print isn’t great and is hard to print from
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to try this out when I received it, but it is really terrible to get it to print. The app they have you use to print is awful. It took me 20 minutes how to figure out how to print a document, and I was never able to get it to print from a web page. It’s a lot of steps to get your documents to print, and on top of that the Bluetooth connection kept disconnecting.Using this printer was very frustrating. I have no desire to use this portable printer again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little printer
reviews.reviewText: This printer can fit in my purse! Very little and compact but does the job of printing what I need. Once app is installed there are different types of documents to print such as portraits, psfs and pre templates

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ditch the Ink, Embrace Mobility
reviews.reviewText: Gone are the days of lugging bulky printers on trips or scrambling for ink cartridges at the last minute. The Relassy Portable Printer throws ink hassles out the window, offering a compact, inkless printing solution for the mobile professional or home user. Let's delve into its strengths and weaknesses to see if it deserves a spot in your bag. Mobility Marvel: This printer lives up to its "portable" title. It's lightweight, easily fitting in a backpack or purse, and its rechargeable battery frees you from wall outlets. Printing on the go for receipts, boarding passes, or even quick presentations becomes a breeze. Plus, the Bluetooth connectivity allows for seamless printing from various devices, eliminating the need for cables. Inkless Efficiency: Thermal printing technology eliminates the need for messy ink cartridges, saving money and reducing waste. The printing quality, while not photorealistic, is crisp and clear for text and basic graphics, making it ideal for everyday documents, notes, or labels. However, keep in mind that thermal paper is not as durable as traditional paper, and prints may fade over time. Not Without Quirks: While the printer excels in portability and inkless printing, it has limitations. The A4 thermal paper size might feel restrictive for some, and printing speeds are slower than traditional laser or inkjet printers. Additionally, the app required for printing can be clunky at times, and the supported file formats are limited. Verdict: If you prioritize mobility, convenience, and ink-free printing, the Relassy Portable Printer is a compelling option. However, if you need high-speed printing, diverse paper sizes, or extensive file format compatibility, a traditional printer might be a better fit. Ultimately, this little marvel shines for its portability and inkless efficiency, making it a valuable tool for the on-the-go professional or anyone seeking a hassle-free printing solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fully functional, it is a very practical Bluetooth printer!
reviews.reviewText: This portable printer is designed to be compact and easy to carry, making it perfect for travel and mobile work. It can wirelessly connect mobile phones and tablets through Bluetooth, with fast printing speed and excellent printing quality.
